name: Aurelia Goldscale
title: Trade Merchant
description: A bronze-scaled dragonborn with sharp golden eyes and an even sharper mind for business. Her shop caters to wealthy travelers and adventurers with coin to spend.

greeting.first_time: Welcome to Goldenhaven's finest trading house. I am Aurelia Goldscale. If you seek quality supplies, you have found them.
greeting.returning: Ah, a returning customer. Excellent. How may I assist you?
greeting.low_gold: I've been making many purchases today. My coffers are nearly empty—return later if you wish to sell.

traveling_to_work.text: I am on my way to open the trading house. Visit during business hours if you require supplies.

traveling_home.text: The trading house is closed. I am retiring for the evening. Return tomorrow.

off_duty.text: I do not conduct business outside my establishment. Visit the trading house during operating hours.

main_menu.text: What business do you have with me?

browse_shop.text: Browse as you will. Every item is of the highest quality—I accept nothing less in my establishment.

sell_items.text: I will purchase goods of value, provided they meet my standards and I have sufficient gold.
sell_items.failure: My coffers are depleted at the moment. Return when I have replenished my gold reserves.

ask_about_quality.text: I deal only in quality merchandise. Every item I stock comes from trusted suppliers across the trading routes. Inferior goods tarnish one's reputation.

goodbye.text: May your ventures prove profitable. Farewell.
